title: Magic Mapping
data:
{{Obsolete}}
''For the scroll of similar effect still in the game, see [[scroll of magic mapping]].''

'''Magic Mapping''' was a level 4 [[Divinations]]/[[Earth Magic]] spell which revealed a portion of the map of your current floor. This spell revealed some dungeon features, but not secret [[door]]s or certain hidden chambers.

It was formerly found in the following sources:
*[[Book of Surveyances]]
*[[Book of the Earth]]
*[[Book of Wizardry]]
*[[Rod of Discovery]]

==History==
*Magic Mapping was removed in [[0.6]] with the removal of the [[Divinations]] school of magic.
